author: pquerna
msg: Don't assume the response bucket is non-null.

msg: (do_conn_setup) Move creation of the barrier bucket to protect our
aggregate bucket, not the possibly user supplied bucket.

author: pquerna
msg: Use a barrier bucket to protect our ostream_tail bucket.

msg: Refactor where to store ostream's head/tail, and centralize calling into conn setup.

author: pquerna
msg: Always keep a reference to the top aggregate bucket, and never prepend to it.
